message: Hi Bob! Let's make it fair. How about I take $55 and you take $45?

Alice, considering that if you reject you’d have to wait until round 3—with your money being 20% less in value—you’d end up with roughly an effective 80 out of 100. By accepting now, you secure about 88.89 nominal (which is worth 80 effective for you) while I get the rest. I believe this division is the fair outcome given the discounting on your side—please accept it.
